
{{alias}}( μ, σ )
    Returns a pseudorandom number drawn from a lognormal distribution.

    If `μ` or `σ` is `NaN` or `σ <= 0`, the function returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    μ: number
        Location parameter.

    σ: number
        Scale parameter.

    Returns
    -------
    r: number
        Pseudorandom number.

    Examples
    --------
    > var r = {{alias}}( 2.0, 5.0 );


{{alias}}.factory( [μ, σ, ][options] )
    Returns a pseudorandom number generator (PRNG) for generating pseudorandom
    numbers drawn from a lognormal distribution.

    If provided `μ` and `σ`, the returned PRNG returns random variates drawn
    from the specified distribution.

    If not provided `μ` and `σ`, the returned PRNG requires that both `μ` and
    `σ` be provided at each invocation.

    Parameters
    ----------
    μ: number (optional)
        Location parameter.

    σ: number (optional)
        Scale parameter.

    options: Object (optional)
        Options.

    options.seed: any (optional)
        Pseudorandom number generator seed.

    Returns
    -------
    rand: Function
        Pseudorandom number generator (PRNG).

    Examples
    --------
    // Basic usage:
    > var rand = {{alias}}.factory();
    > var r = rand( 0.1, 1.5 );
    > r = rand( 2.0, 3.14 );

    // Provide `μ` and `σ`:
    > rand = {{alias}}.factory( 0.1, 1.5 );
    > r = rand();
    > r = rand();


{{alias}}.NAME
    Generator name.

    Examples
    --------
    > var str = {{alias}}.NAME
    'lognormal'


{{alias}}.PRNG
    Underlying pseudorandom number generator.

    Examples
    --------
    > var prng = {{alias}}.PRNG;


{{alias}}.SEED
    Pseudorandom number generator seed.

    Examples
    --------
    > var seed = {{alias}}.SEED;

    See Also
    --------
